name: Wardrive (JuicyBoot)
description:
Wardrive is a topdown vehicular combat game for up to three players.

Following a devastating accident caused by the wicked Turdcutter, Hard Tommy and Mad Mel must learn anew how to drive with only a single set of limbs between the, wreaking havoc and taking revenge on the Turdcutter's Gang,

Get in, get out, and cause as much mayhem as possible!
